TIPS_MENU_CT: How to Connect Your CT Sensor
TIPS_TEXT_NOW_SUB1: Turn on the home appliance then turn it off. Did you see the change? Try it if you want to find out power consumption of home appliance.
TIPS_TEXT_NOW_MAIN2: Assume family member is at home.
TIPS_TEXT_NOW_SUB2: Remember the numerical value when all family members weren't at home. If your family come back home, you will notice the numerical difference.
TIPS_TEXT_NOW_SUB3: In comparison with yesterday and the usage of the last week of the same day of the week, let's do check and manage using the electric How much today.
TIPS_TEXT_NOW_MAIN4: Let's check the home of the life pattern.
TIPS_TEXT_NOW_SUB4: What time do I wake up today ? What time did I go to bed  What did not happen during my absence ? Looking at the energy watch, you can see the life pattern at a glance.
TIPS_TEXT_TODAY_MAIN1: How much do I use electricity today?
TIPS_TEXT_TODAY_SUB1:
Check out today's electricity usage.
With comparing yesterday's and last week's usage, manage our home's electricity consumption.
TIPS_TEXT_TODAY_SUB2:
What time did we wake up today?
When we slept last night?
Did my kid arrived at home in this afternoon?
Check our home lifestyle with EnerTalk energy clock.


* TODAY is available only for BASIC service
TIPS_TEXT_LASTMONTH_SUB1: You don't need to collect bills. You just check monthly usage on your cell phone.
TIPS_TEXT_LASTMONTH_SUB2: This is enough to show how you use electricity in your house.
TIPS_TEXT_TIMELINE_SUB1:
에너지 사용 패턴, 가전별 사용량 등을 분석하여
맞춤형 스마트 메시지를 보내 드립니다.
TIPS_TEXT_TIMELINE_SUB2:
바쁜 일상생활 속에서 전기까지 하나하나 신경 쓰기 어려우셨죠?
이제 에너톡이 에너지 비서가 되어 드릴게요!
에너지 건강 점수, 주말 활동 제안, 보안 등등
유용한 정보를 통해 에너지와 친해질 수 있어요. : )
TIPS_TEXT_TIMELINE_SUB3:
에너지만 연구하는 꿀팁박사가 들려주는
재미있고 스마트한 콘텐츠로
다채로운 에너지 생활을 즐겨 보세요. : )
TIPS_TEXT_THISMONTH_SUB1:
한 눈에 보기 힘든 청구서들은 이제 그만!
지난달, 이번 달을 쉽게 이동하면서
월별 사용 요금과 사용량 정보를 확인해보세요.
TIPS_TEXT_THISMONTH_MAIN2: 어렵기만 한 요금폭탄의 주범, 누진 단계!
TIPS_TEXT_THISMONTH_SUB2:
현재, 예상 누진 단계에 대한 정보 뿐 아니라,
단계별 기본 요금, 단가 등에 대한 정보,
그리고 요금이 어떻게 계산되는 지에 대한 상세 내역까지!
에너지 가계부 하나면 전기 요금 박사가 될 수 있어요.
TIPS_TEXT_THISMONTH_MAIN3: When my home is using a lot of electricity ?
TIPS_TEXT_THISMONTH_SUB3:
Good day if savings by analyzing the usage,
You can know the time zone of the weekday / weekend easy.

TIPS_TEXT_THISMONTH_SUB4:
Whether you are using how much electricity every day
To be able to know by month / time zone, you can live eco-friendly energy life
TIPS_TEXT_PLAN_SUB1: If you plan usage of electricity ahead, we will help that you didn't in excess of use.

TIPS_TEXT_NILM_SUB2: Through the timeline about using home appliances, you can see the daily doings of the family in one glance.

From now easy to measure, you can manage .

Please start the measurement in the state is turned off.
Put the power of consumer electronics , it is ending at the click of a cut and click Finish !
Anyone can be easily measured.
TIPS_TEXT_APPLIANCE_MAIN3:
From the newly purchased home appliances to old appliances
Let's management while looking at the list of measurement .
TIPS_TEXT_APPLIANCE_SUB3:
If only briefly note of the measurement situation at that time
you can figure out depending on the amount of time that was measured under the same conditions
Consumer electronics of aging, such as replacement time.
TIPS_TEXT_ECO_MAIN1: The way to save earth? Not a difficult!
TIPS_TEXT_ECO_SUB1:
Get together a small action to practice in every day Enetoku
Reduces the amount of CO2 little by little, you can contribute to the environment .
TIPS_TEXT_ECO_SUB2:
With the EnerTalk on hand
You can easily protect the global environment .
Please try to experience the eco-life to practice a success and a small promise of mission from today .

TalkTalk ideas !
Let's make the my own eco-puzzle

thay are taking a meal, whether sleep well?

TIPS_TEXT_CT_MAIN1: Please connect your CT sensor over the main line to get accurate electricity usage.
TIPS_TEXT_CT_SUB1: If you have any problem or question regarding CT sensor, please contact us.
TIPS_TEXT_QUESTION1: What is the W, Wh, kWh?
TIPS_TEXT_ANSWER1:
W means, how much the home appliances use electricity. Just as people to live to eat the rice , also out of the energy from consuming the electrical home appliances . Like peoplehave different much of meal, all of the consumer electronics equipment have different W.
The
Wh, it means either ate between how much electricity an hour . You can convert the 1,000Wh in 1kWh. Once the refrigerator of 100W is eat a 30-day electricity by 10 hours a day , you have to consume 30kWh. The amount

refrigerator eat electricity : 100W
use time : 10 hours X 30 days = 300h (hour, time )
300 hours , will be 30kWh because consumed the electricity of 100W.
100Wx300h = 30,000Wh = 30kWh
TIPS_TEXT_QUESTION2: What is the residential low power / high power?
TIPS_TEXT_ANSWER2:
주택용 전력 요금은 저압과 고압으로 나뉘어 계산됩니다. 저압은 단독주택, 연립주택, 저층아파트, 기숙사, 주거용 오피스텔에, 고압은 중층 아파트 등에 적용되는 요금제입니다.

계약종별(저압/고압)은 우리 집 요금 계산을 위해 꼭 필요한 항목입니다.
계약종별에 따라 누진 단계별 kWh당 단가 및 기본 요금이 다르게 적용됩니다.

우리 집 계약종별이 궁금할 때에는 한국전력공사 고객센터(123) 또는 관리사무소에 문의해주시기 바랍니다.

단독주택, 빌라(연립주택, 다세대주택)에 거주하실 경우, 주택용 저압으로 설정하시면 됩니다.
